original: 史上姓名不詳，《三國演義》中稱其為鄒氏，鄒圓之名乃本作虛構。張繡初降時，曹操納鄒圓為妾室，張繡因此不滿，叛變，大敗曹操。
text: His name is unknown in history. In The Romance of the Three Kingdoms, he is called the Zou family. The name of Zou Yuan is a fictitious work. When Zhang Xiu first came down, Cao Cao accepted Zou Yuan as a concubine, Zhang Xiu was dissatisfied, rebelled, and defeated Cao Cao.
